digishift.title: DigiShift
digishift.shortDescription: Digital transformation solutions to modernize your business operations
digishift.fullDescription: Comprehensive digital transformation solutions to modernize your business operations and drive growth in the digital economy.

features.title: Digital Assessment
features.description: Evaluate digital maturity and define a transformation roadmap through stakeholder interviews and current tool assessment.

features.title: E-Commerce Setup
features.description: Establish or optimize online sales platforms using Shopify or WooCommerce with integrated payment gateways like Paystack and Flutterwave.

features.title: Digital Infrastructure
features.description: Implement cloud-based tools and integrate Customer Relationship Management/Enterprises Resource Planning systems for operational efficiency and scalability.

features.title: Cybersecurity
features.description: Protect digital assets through security audits, staff training, and policy development aligned with Nigerian regulations.

capspring.title: CAPSPRING
capspring.shortDescription: Business growth and capital access strategies for scaling companies
capspring.fullDescription: Strategic business growth solutions and capital access strategies to help your company scale effectively in competitive markets.

features.title: Market Expansion
features.description: Identify scaling opportunities and develop market entry strategies for business growth.

features.title: Regulatory Compliance
features.description: Boost investor confidence through comprehensive regulatory compliance frameworks.

features.title: Capital Access
features.description: Connect with loan opportunities, venture capitalists, and business angels to secure funding.

features.title: Business Valuation
features.description: Establish market position and determine accurate business valuation for investment rounds.

talentforge.title: TalentForge
talentforge.shortDescription: Human resource optimization and leadership development programs
talentforge.fullDescription: Comprehensive talent management solutions to optimize your workforce, develop leadership capabilities, and create efficient HR processes.

features.title: Skill Assessment
features.description: Identify workforce gaps and training needs to build a more capable team.

features.title: Leadership Development
features.description: Build capacity through workshops and toolkits designed for emerging and established leaders.

features.title: Performance Management
features.description: Implement KPIs and review processes to optimize team performance.

features.title: HR Management
features.description: Streamline processes for efficiency and better employee experience.

features.title: Succession Planning
features.description: Ensure leadership continuity through structured succession planning.

smartstart.title: SmartStart Compass
smartstart.shortDescription: Comprehensive startup guidance from ideation to execution
smartstart.fullDescription: End-to-end startup guidance that takes your business from initial concept through to successful market entry and growth.

features.title: Foundation Building
features.description: Begin with client onboarding, needs assessment, and a comprehensive feasibility study to validate your business idea in the Nigerian market.

features.title: Business Modeling & Financial Planning
features.description: Develop a tailored Business Model Canvas and create 3-5 year financial projections with budgeting templates and cash flow management strategies.

features.title: Legal & Accounting Setup
features.description: Ensure compliance with Nigerian regulations through business registration support and establish a scalable cloud-based accounting system.

features.title: Strategic Roadmapping
features.description: Align with client strategic roadmap through bi-weekly sessions and develop a 12-month action plan with clear milestones.

etrademarket.title: eTradeMarket
etrademarket.shortDescription: International trade and export compliance solutions
etrademarket.fullDescription: Comprehensive international trade solutions to help businesses expand globally with proper export compliance and virtual presence.

features.title: Premium Virtual Booth Setup
features.description: Create an engaging online presence for trade fairs with interactive elements like videos, live chat, and product demos.

features.title: Export Compliance Support
features.description: Prepare for international trade through export readiness assessment, guidance through Nigerian Export Promotion Council requirements, and provision of documentation templates.
